DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of VEC-162 compared to matching placebo on circadian phase shift and sleep parameters.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of VEC-162 on Circadian Rhythm in Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: No medical, psychiatric, or sleep disorders Ability to provide written informed consent Lifetime history of night shift work Evidence of any sleep disorder Psychiatric or neurological disorders
